MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Dickson Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:03PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25am on 16th April
